text: nivu kanalillave? Allahanu akasadinda nirannu surisi, adannu cilumegalagisi bhumiyalli harisuttane. Taruvaya avanu allinda vividha bannada belegalannu horategeyuttane. A balika adu onagi biduttade mattu adu haladiyaguvudannu nivu kanuttiri. A balika avanu adannu curu curagisi biduttane. Idaralli bud'dhivantarige khandita pathavide
